content:
A concentric circle pattern is a fantastic choice for a elegant and visually appealing arrangement. It's also a great way to showcase the beautiful colors and textures of the strawberries and blueberries.

Remember to have fun and be gentle when arranging the fruits. You can also adjust the pattern as you go along to make sure it looks balanced and harmonious.

To take your tart to the next level, consider adding some fresh greenery, like mint leaves or lemon verbena, around the edges of the tart or as a garnish. This will add a pop of color and freshness to the arrangement.

If you're feeling extra creative, you could also try adding some edible flowers, like violas or pansies, to the tart. Just make sure to use flowers that are safe for consumption and handle them gently to avoid bruising.

Lastly, don't forget to take a step back and admire your handiwork before serving. You've put in the effort to create a beautiful tart, and it's okay to take a moment to appreciate your hard work!

I hope your summer fruit tart turns out stunning, and I'm sure it will be a hit with your friends and family. If you have any more questions or need further guidance, feel free to ask. Otherwise, happy baking and enjoy your delicious tart!
